translated: Laozi's Sutra on Converting the Barbarians
Scroll 1... opening it, then condensing it...
... the beginning of the Way, I wish to write it, not with a brush...

... its essence has no form that can be compared to, floating without an outside, sometimes sinking, sometimes... like echoes ceasing, like clouds dispersing... ... catching fish, comparing it to the Way is not enough to describe it, without deep pity... ... serving as the pillar historian of Zhou for 900 years, with a golden body... silver teeth, a dragon face with a rhinoceros pattern, ears higher than the top of the head, sun-like horns, moon-like eyebrows, a nose with double pillars, flat in the middle, feet treading on two fives, hands holding ten patterns, at the end of the ultimate, speaking of returning to Kunlun, transforming those barbarians, after Kapilavastu, then to India, thus he finally moved the text, hanging it down for later generations, forever not disappearing.
Preface to the Sutra of Laozi's Western Ascension and Conversion of the Barbarians, Part 1: At that time, the Most High Lord Lao,
in the year Jiachen of King Tang of Yin, in the month of Jian,
from the realm of the Constant Way,
driving the clouds of the Three Qi,
riding on the essence of the sun, hanging down the Nine Radiances,
entering the mouth of the Jade Maiden Xuanmiao,
entrusting his body to be conceived.
On the fifteenth day of the second month of Gengchen, he was born in Hao.
Nine dragons spit water to wash his body,
transforming into nine wells.
At that time, Lord Lao's beard and hair were white,
he could walk as soon as he was born,
lotus flowers grew under his feet,
up to nine in number.ğŸ”½He pointed to the sky with his left hand,
and pointed to the ground with his right hand,
and said to people,
In heaven and on earth,
only I am the most honored.
I shall proclaim the unsurpassed Way and Dharma,
universally delivering all sentient beings, including plants and trees,
throughout the ten directions and even the dark hells.
Those who should be saved but have not yet been saved, all of them will be saved.
Concealed and manifested among humans.
Serving as the teacher and model for the country.
Attaining the position of the Supreme Ultimate.
The unsurpassed immortal.
At that time, there naturally appeared a heavenly robe and cassia-scented body.
Divine fragrance filled the room.
The sun's radiance doubled.
In the middle of the ninth day.
The body grew to nine feet tall.
The crowd all marveled and discussed it.
Considering him a sage.
Born with the appearance of an old man.
Therefore, he was called Laozi.
The celestial spirits in the sky.
Praised the ten epithets.
The ten things spoken of.

The Most High Lord Lao, the perfect spirit, the unsurpassed sage, the teacher of emperors, the great man, the venerable great immortal, the father of celestials and humans, the unconditioned superior person, the compassionate benevolent one, the Primordial Beginning Venerable Lord. After this, Lord Lao.
Concentrated his spirit and mixed with traces.
Teaching and transforming celestials and humans.
Also explaining the methods for governing the body internally and externally.
For over a hundred years.
The royal way was about to decline.
Killing the virtuous and good.
Wrongfully harming countless people.
Loyal ministers gave stern admonitions.
And were executed.
Heaven sent down great disasters.
Yet they were still unaware.
This went on for many years.
They were destroyed by the Zhou.
During the time of King Kang.
The year was Jiazi.
Also the same as secular officials.
Concealing his traces and hiding his name.
As a pillar official.
Assisting the king.
Up to King Zhao.
The year was Gui Chou.
He then departed to the west.
Passing through Hangu Pass.
He bestowed the five thousand chapters and phrases of the Way and Virtue.
And spoke the sutras of the Wonderful Truth and the Western Ascension.
Up to the supreme Dharma of the Great Clarity, the true texts of the Three Caverns, the talismans and diagrams of the Numinous Treasure, and the methods of the Great Mystery.
Causing him to teach.
Reaching the refined and benevolent ones who transform into immortals.
Causing them to be uninterrupted.
He then crossed to the west.
Passing through the Flowing Sands.
To the country of Khotan, to the city of Vima.
At that time, Laojun raised the festival of the Tathagata.
He summoned his followers.
In a short while,

there were the Red Pine Master, the Yellowä¸ˆ Man, the Heavenly King of Primordial Commencement, the Primordial Lord of the Great One, the Jade Maidens of the Six Ding, the Divine Lords of the Eight Trigrams, the Lords of Dragons and Tigers, the Attendants of Merit and Cauldron, the Golden Carriage Youth, the Youthful Light of Wisdom, the Heavenly Officials, the Earth Officials, the Water Officials, the Space Officials, the Sun Officials, the Moon Officials, the Mountain Officials, the Sea Officials, the Yin Officials, the Yang Officials, the Wood Officials, the Fire Officials, the Metal Officials, the Earth Officials, the Lords of the Five Marchmounts and Four Continents, the Divine Lords, the Heavenly Ding Warriors, the Wandering Luo Generals, the Flying Divine Kings, and the Immortal Jade Maidens.
More than 100,000 people,
riding on clouds and driving dragons,
floating in the sky, arrived.
Then the Old Lord was in the Jade Tent,
sitting on a seven-jeweled seat.
Burning incense of a hundred blends,
scattering various famous flowers,
playing heavenly music,
the sages of the heavens surrounding him on all sides.
Furthermore, with spiritual power, he summoned the Hu kings.
regardless of distance.
People from all walks of life gathered.
The king of Khotan, the king of Jukubhan, the king of Khabanda,
the king of the great Yuezhi, the king of Kuttara, the king of Kumy, the king of Jiasuo,ğŸ”½the king of Balhana, the king of Kuvandha, the king of Yidanta, the king of Ulaha,
the king of Shifanian, the king of Huoshijian, the king of Tulejian, the king of Kasmira,

the king of Hatara, the king of Persia, the king of Kucha, the king of Suyab,ğŸ”½the king of Kucha, the king of Fulin, the king of the Great Food Country, the king of the Zhilin Country,ğŸ”½the king of the Sumu Country, the king of the Hengmo Country, the king of the Jueyaguo Country, the king of the Saguo Country,
the king of the Daming Country, the king of Gaochang, the king of Yutian, the king of Qiuming.
King of the Stone Country, King of the Sela Country, King of the Kang Country, King of the Shi Country, King of the Mi
Country, King of the Simhapura Country, King of the Cao Country, King of the He Country, King of the Large and Small An
Countries, King of the Mu Country, King of the Udra Country, King of the JumbudvÄ«pa Country, King of the Hu-jin

, King of the DÄ«paá¹ƒkara Country, King of the KÄmarÅ«pa Country, King of GandhÄrağŸ”½, King of the UdyÄna Country, King of the KÄÅ›mÄ«ra Country, King of the KÄla Country, King of the AparÄnta Country
, King of the NÄbhÄ«ja Country, King of the MathurÄ Country, King of the KuÅ›inagara
Country, King of VaiÅ›ÄlÄ«, King of the Kapitha Country, King of ÅšrÄvastÄ«, King of CampÄ
, King of the Samataá¹­a Country, King of Uá¸á¸iyÄna, King of SurÄá¹£á¹­ra
King of Sindhu, King of Udyana, King of Huluo, King of Gou TouğŸ”½King of Sekaritta, King of Mantuozhi, King of Nibala, King of Yeditian
King of Xami, King of Xiaoren, King of Xuanju, King of Dhara Ira
King of Langjialuo, King of the Five Regions of India.
More than eighty such kings of these countries.ğŸ”½And their empresses.
And their retinues.
Surrounding them all around.
All came to listen to the Dharma.
At that time, Laojun told the kings of the various countries:
Your minds are poisonous.
You like to kill and harm.
You only eat blood and flesh.
You cut off the lives of many beings.
I will now tell you the Yaksha Sutra for you.
To make you stop eating meat and only eat wheat cakes.
Do not slaughter.
Those who cannot stop.
Use the meat of those that have died naturally.
The Hu people are stubborn.
They do not recognize relatives or strangers.
They only delight in greed and lust.
They have no gratitude or righteousness.
Their beards and hair are curled and disheveled.
It is extremely difficult to comb and wash them.
Their nature is foul and unclean.
Their bodies are full of dirt and filth.
If they cultivate the Way,
they are people of afflictive activities.
Therefore, they are all made to shave their beards and hair.
They wear felt and fur robes according to their original customs.
They are taught the lesser path,
to gradually cultivate and learn.
They also uphold the precepts,
and slightly practice kindness and compassion.
On the fifteenth day of every month,
they must always repent.
Moreover, with spiritual powers, they manifest the form of a transformed Buddha,
soaring through the air,
with a body sixteen feet tall.
The body is made of golden color.
The face always faces east,
showing not forgetting the origin.
Because I came from the east, this appearance is revealed.
Causing those who see it
to give rise to a kind and compassionate mind.
You kings,
all your court visits, I face the image,
facing east to conduct affairs.
In this way, before long,
Passing over the Jinyang Mountains,
there was a deep pool in the middle,
where a poisonous dragon resided.
Five hundred merchants
stayed by the poolside,
and were harmed by the dragon.
In the end, not a single one was left.
I left the country to King Kapatadha, who passed on the spell to him.
He went to the pool to practice the Dharma.
The dragon king was terrified.
He then transformed into a human,
apologized to the king, and asked to move elsewhere.
He would no longer harm the people here.
He ordered those who would come and go later to end their harm.
Next, he went south to reach the country of Wu-chang.
He traveled all over the five heavens.
He entered the country of Magadha.
I wore plain clothes.
I held an empty gourd in my hand.
I placed it in the monastery.
I established the Futu teaching.
It was called the Pure and Clean Buddha.
I ordered the kshatriyas, brahmins, and others to serve it.
In order to seek the unsurpassed true path.
I passed through thirty-eight years.
During the time of King Mu.
I returned to China.
Sent to enter the Eastern Sea.
Reaching the islands of Fangzhang and others in Penglai.
Arriving at the Fusang.
Temporarily passing through the place of the Great Emperor.
Composing and collecting the ranks of immortals, praising the high and low positions.
Again, passing through more than two hundred years of the eight kings.
When the profound is expounded.
In the year Xinyou.
The three rivers shook and agitated.
The king was about to perish.
Encountering the number one hundred and six times.
Not something that humans can control.
I will cross to the west again.
Teaching and transforming various countries.
Next, entering the Western Sea.
Reaching the islands of Juqu, Liulin, and others.

Summoning all the great beings of the immortals of the ten directions, as well as those who attained the Way first and the lords of the underworld who have not yet been appointed, and the immortals who roam and enjoy themselves, those who have experienced the degree of utmost filial piety and utmost loyalty.
There were more than 80,000 people of this kind.
Weighing the merits and demerits of their karmic actions, light and heavy.
Granting them official positions of the five ranks and twenty-seven grades of immortals, the supreme sages of the immortal truth of the mountains and rivers, the three heavens.
All were appointed like this.
And another sixty years passed.
During the time of King Huan.
In the year Jiazi, the first yin month.
I ordered Yin Xi.
To ride on the essence of that moon.
To descend into the country of Central India and enter the mouth of the wife of the white-robed man, entrusting myself to be born.
Called Siddhartha.
Abandoning the position of crown prince.
Entering the mountains to cultivate the Way.
Achieving the unsurpassed Way.
Called Buddha.
First establishing the twelve Siddham letters.
Repeatedly separating and combining into more than thirty thousand words.
Extensively explaining the sutras and precepts.
Seeking the unsurpassed Dharma.
Also destroying the ninety-six kinds of deviant paths.
Living for seventy years.
Showing people nirvana.
During the time of King Xiang.
In the year Yiyou.
I returned to China.
Teaching and transforming celestials and humans.
Then bestowing upon Kong Qiu the Dharma of benevolence and righteousness.
After that, for sixty years during the reign of King Tan.
Dividing the country from the capital.
The king had no virtue.
I then ascended Kunlun.ğŸ”½Flying up to the Purple Tenuity,
I spread my qi throughout the three realms,
Nurturing all.
Later, after more than 450 years,
I rode on the natural radiant qi of the Way,
Flying from the realm of true tranquility into the Su Lin country in the Western Jade Realm.
I was born in the royal family,
Demonstrating as a prince.
Abandoning the household to enter the Way,
Called Maá¹‡i.
Turning the great Dharma wheel,
Expounding the scriptures, precepts, and the Dharma of concentration and wisdom,
Up to the three periods and the two schools of Buddhism,
Teaching and transforming celestial beings and humans,
Causing them to know their original state.ğŸ”½Above reaching the realm of light,
Below extending to the netherworld,
All sentient beings,
Are all liberated by this.
After Maá¹‡i,
At the age of 59,
The qi of gold is about to rise,
My Dharma will flourish.
The sacred elephant of the West,
Its colorful robe naturally,
Comes to enter the central continent, this is the effect.
At this time,
Yellow and white qi combine.
The three teachings are mixed and equal.
All return to me.
Temples and monasteries.
Connected eaves and connected ridges.
Translating and expounding the great bright and venerable Dharma of the later sages.
Daoists of the central continent.
Extensively explaining causes and conditions.
As a boat and a guide for the world.
Greatly promoting the Dharma.
Moving and growing creatures.
Universally saving and liberating them all.
This is called the general compendium of all Dharma gates.
